00040 require_once('lib/vars.php');

00042 $DirHandle= opendir($VIEW_PATH);
00043 while (FALSE !== ($DirName= readdir($DirHandle))) {
00044     if (is_dir("$VIEW_PATH/$DirName")) {
00045         $ModuleFiles[]= $DirName;
00046     }
00047 }
00048 closedir($DirHandle);
00049 
00050 $ServiceStatus= '';
00051 if ($View->Controller($Output, 'GetServiceStatus')) {
00052     $ServiceStatus= implode(',', $Output);
00053 }
00054 ?>
00055 <td id="mainmenuframe" rowspan=2>

00068                 <?php
00069                 foreach ($CW_MODULES as $Module => $SubmoduleList) {
00070                     if (in_array($Module, $ModuleFiles)) {
00071                         foreach ($SubmoduleList as $ModuleName => $ModuleConf) {
00072                             if (in_array($_SESSION['USER'], $ModuleConf['Perms'])) {
00073                                 $Class= '';
00074                                 if (strpos($_SERVER['PHP_SELF'], "/$Module/") !== FALSE) {
00075                                     $Class= 'class="active" ';
00076                                 }
00077                                 
00078                                 if (in_array($Module, $ModelsToStat)) {
00079                                     if (preg_match("/$Module=R/", $ServiceStatus)) {
00080                                         $Image= 'run.png';
00081                                         $Name= 'R';
00082                                     }
00083                                     else {
00084                                         $Image= 'stop.png';
00085                                         $Name= 'S';
00086                                     }
00087                                 }
00088                                 else {
00089                                     $Image= 'transparent.png';
00090                                     $Name= ' ';
00091                                 }
00092                                 ?>
00093                                 <li <?php echo $Class ?>>
00094                                     <a href="<?php echo "/$Module/index.php" ?>">
00095                                         <img src="<?php echo $IMG_PATH.$Image ?>" name="<?php echo $Name ?>" alt="<?php echo $Name ?>" align="absmiddle"><?php echo _($ModuleConf['Name']) ?>
00096                                     </a>
00097                                 </li>
00098                                 <?php
00099                             }
00100                         }
00101                     }
00102                 }
00103                 ?>
00104                 </ul>

00106                 <?php
00107                 if ($View->Controller($SensorReadings, 'GetSysCtl', 'hw.sensors')) {
00108                     $Sensors= array();
00109                     foreach ($SensorReadings as $Sensor) {
00110                         // hw.sensors.lm1.temp1=38.50 degC (zone temperature)
00111                         if (preg_match('/^.*=\s*([\d.]+)\s*((degC|RPM).*)$/', $Sensor, $Match)) {
00112                             $Sensors[]= array(
00113                                 'Value' => $Match[1],
00114                                 'Unit'  => $Match[2],
00115                                 );
00116                         }
00117                     }
00118                     // Print only if sensor values are available
00119                     if (count($Sensors) > 0) {
00120                         ?>
00121                         <div id="leftmenutext">
00122                             <table align="right">
00123                                 <tr>
00124                                     <td colspan="2">
00125                                         <?php echo _MENU('Sensors').':' ?>
00126                                     </td>
00127                                 </tr>
